GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
dm era: commit metadata in postsuspend after worker stops

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit c593a5c135ba8ef3df1baf38524ef8bd3fe51639, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit eec40579d84873dfb7021eb24c50360f073237c5. For more details please see the references link.
